name: Beloved's Storm Warning
description: Dark and Stormy's creamier cousin from Beloved in Greenpoint, Brooklyn is more complex than Gosling's tempest, but it's every bit as easy to drink. Sweetened ginger juice brings a funky spice and milky mouthfeel and bittersweet Cynar rounds it all out.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce fresh squeezed juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rum, Cynar, ginger juice, and lime juice in shaker with a small handful of pebble-sized pieces of cracked ice. Shake until fully chilled and diluted (about 15 seconds).
Strain into iced filled Collins glass, top with club soda and three dashes Peychaud's bitters, serve.
